title: How do I save battery power?
answer:
- Enable power saving mode. (Not all models support this function.)   
   On the home screen, touch Settings > Power saving and select a power saving mode.   
 - When your HUAWEI MediaPad is not in use, press the power button to turn off the screen.   
 - Set the screen timeout period to a smaller value.   
   On the home screen, touch Settings > Display > Sleep and select a shorter timeout period. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730163310771001.png)  

 -  Lower the screen brightness.   
   On the home screen, touch Settings > Display > Brightness, and drag the slider to lower the screen brightness.   
 - Use the headset when you are in a call or listening to music.   
 - Turn off Bluetooth when you do not need it. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730163435682001.png)  

 -  Turn off Wi-Fi when you do not need it.  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730163607975001.png)  

 -  Turn off GPS when you do not need it. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150730163631894001.png)  

 The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
